attributes.action: Try and save a babies life before its 24 weeks!
attributes.additional_details:
babies born before 24 weeks, doctors and midwives make no attempt to try and save their lives, babies born at 24 weeks and they will.
babies born at any age should try and be saved, its disgusting that they don't.
other countries dont do this and England are the only one that does its cruel and unfair!
Please join this petition to get this changed!
